shortdesc.ph: Used to configure the format, size, and pixel buffer of the watermark image.
Used to configure the format, size, and pixel buffer of the watermark image.
Used to configure the format, size, and pixel buffer of a watermark image.
Used to configure the format, dimensions, and pixel buffer of a watermark image.

plentry.pd: The width of the watermark image, in pixels.
The height of the watermark image, in pixels.
The length of the watermark image buffer, in bytes.

Length of the watermark image buffer in bytes.
Pixel format of the watermark image. See . Default is VIDEO_PIXEL_I420. Currently supported formats include: VIDEO_PIXEL_I420, VIDEO_PIXEL_RGBA, VIDEO_PIXEL_BGRA, and VIDEO_PIXEL_NV21.
Pixel buffer data of the watermark image.
